description:
This course is a quick course (more like a mini-course) for entrepreneurs, or those that want to start a business soon.

In the course I boil down 10+ years of experience as an entrepreneur. I've had successful businesses ranging from freelance writer, jewelry & accessory designer & Etsy shop owner, web & blog designer, business coach & consultant and even more!

I've also worked with hundreds upon hundreds of entrepreneurs over the years that struggle to build their businesses. There's so much to running a business. I can't actually make it easy, but I can help you make it a whole lot easier.

How?

By accessing your strengths, but in a new & innovative way. This isn't a long strengths and weaknesses test where the results sound cool, but don't have a whole lot of application.

This is a quick quiz (if you choose to take it, if not, you'll still get tons of value from this course.)

There are also only 3 answers:

1. Connector

2. Creator

3. Collaborator

You'll also learn in the course why you actually need to use all 3 in various ways to grow your business with less time at your computer.

This course will really help you if you dream of owning a successful online business, or want to be a laptop entrepreneur.

No materials are necessary for this course, just a willingness to learn and a commitment to play nice in the course community.

~Ashlee (Thurlow) Geheb
title: Your Business SuperPower: Grow Your Business In Less Time
